Event.info: SMS/iMessage phishes forcing users to install/run scripts and update VPN settings

Attribute.comment: Phishing used against Apple employees + others, this would be dropped by script that they are attempting to get piped to bash via a SMS/iMessage request.  This is just a simple pyinstaller wrapped pupy script which beacons back to tipok.gotdns.ch

Phishing used against Apple employees + others, this would be dropped by script that they are attempting to get piped to bash via a SMS/iMessage request.  This is just a simple pyinstaller wrapped pupy script which beacons back to tatiano96.zapto.org
